title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 18 ยง 1003.2 - Prompt payment policy
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 18 ยง 1003.2 - Prompt payment policy

State Regulations

It is the policy of the Fund to process contract payments
efficiently and expeditiously so as to assure payment in a timely manner to
firms and organizations which do business with the Fund and to avoid, to the
greatest extent practicable, the payment of interest in cases where prompt
payment does not occur as provided in this Part. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes
R. & Regs. Tit. 18
ยง
1003.2

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
